title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Documents to Decisions: Unleashing AI-Powered Business Automation (SMB204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从文档到决策：释放AI驱动的业务自动化 (SMB204)
abstract: Discover how SMBs are transforming document-heavy processes using AWS AI services. Learn from AArete’s success story as they share how combining Amazon Textract, Amazon Bedrock, and Bedrock Data Automation helped extract insights from documents and revolutionize workflows. We’ll dive deep into implementation patterns, share best practices from dozens of customer engagements, and explore how Agentic AI can automate complex business processes - from intelligent routing and approvals to automated vendor onboarding and compliance checks. See how AWS’s comprehensive solution helps SMBs unlock new levels of operational efficiency, fault tolerance, and cost optimizations.
abstract_cn: 了解中小企业如何使用AWS AI服务转变文档密集型流程。从AArete的成功案例中学习，了解他们如何结合Amazon Textract、Amazon Bedrock和Bedrock Data Automation从文档中提取洞察并彻底改革工作流程。我们将深入探讨实施模式，分享来自数十个客户项目的最佳实践，并探索代理AI如何自动化复杂的业务流程——从智能路由和审批到自动化供应商入驻和合规检查。了解AWS的综合解决方案如何帮助中小企业释放运营效率、容错能力和成本优化的新水平。

presenter.name: Priya Iragavarapu
presenter.title: Vice President, Data Science and AI
